text: For insights from #localgov #comms & #nhscomms peers on what works for #COVID19, check out 2 of our recent timesaving 15-min Lunch Bite webinars. With advice on #vaccine rollout, engaging young people & bridging gaps in local knowledge with reliable data: https://t.co/4WFNNWA7qc https://t.co/G8RlBtP0qi
